# Build Folders
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.Generated.cs
*.designer.cs
*.g.cs
*.g.i.cs

# Azure deployment files
.publish/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
# Uncomment if NuGet packages should be ignored
# **/packages/*
# Uncomment if NuGet restore is disabled
# !**/packages/build/
# !**/packages/repositories.config

# Visual Studio temporary files
*.vs/
.vscode/
*.log

# Build results
*.dll
*.exe
*.app
*.apk
*.cache
*.lib
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.ilk
*.idb

# Web files
*.css.map
*.js.map
node_modules/
wwwroot/lib/

# Config files
appsettings*.json

# Files generated by JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# Resharper settings
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

# Log files
*.log

# Database
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.sqlite

# IIS config files
.vs/
_UpgradeReport_Files/
Backup*/
UpgradeLog*.XML
UpgradeLog*.htm

# StyleCop
StyleCopReport.xml

# Files to prevent from being tracked in distributed version control
*.swp
*.DS_Store
